title: Vaccines - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/13/19
itunes:title: Vaccines - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/13/19
description:
George Noory and attorney Kent Heckenlively explore his work criticizing mandatory vaccinations for children, why so many people speak out against his work, and if there is a possible link between vaccines and the increase in cases of autism in recent years.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: A look at the possible health threats posed by mandatory vaccination of children.
